item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, January 24, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump calls on Opec to push down global oil prices
2. [Opinion] Gen Z Americans are leaving their European cousins in the dust
3. Judge halts Trump’s effort to end US citizenship at birth
4. Davos hits ‘peak pessimism’ on Europe as US exuberance rises
5. Musk warned Reform UK donation might be difficult after joining Trump administration
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, January 24, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
